data.comment: The match is underway in Nuevo Leon.
Throw-in high up the field for Queretaro in Nuevo Leon.
In the minute 1, Queretaro have a dangerous throw-in.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Tigres is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Julian Quinones for Tigres drives towards goal at Estadio Universitario (UANL). But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 5, Ball goes out of play for a Tigres goal kick.
Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 7, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Queretaro.
Throw-in Queretaro.
Penalty! Erick Yair Miranda Galindo points to the spot, great chance for Queretaro...
In the minute 12, Hugo Silveira (Queretaro) has missed a penalty!
In Nuevo Leon Queretaro attack through Hugo Silveira. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nuevo Leon.
In the minute 13, Tigres awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Tigres.
Andre Pierre Gignac (Tigres) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 16, Jesus Duenas for Tigres gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Queretaro a goal kick.
Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
In the minute 18, Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Tigres have a goal kick.
Queretaro's Angel Sepulveda is whistled for offside at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
In the minute 21, Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac breaks free at Estadio Universitario (UANL). But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
In the minute 25, Queretaro have a goal kick.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Tigres in their own half.
Queretaro's Hugo Silveira has been booked in Nuevo Leon.
In the minute 28, Queretaro needs to be cautious. Tigres have an attacking throw-in.
Tigres's Julian Quinones gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Queretaro a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Tigres in their own half.
Hugo Silveira (Queretaro) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
The match at Estadio Universitario (UANL) has been interrupted briefly for a check on Javier Aquino, who is down injured.
In the minute 32, Javier Aquino is back on the pitch.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Javier Aquino for Tigres who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Ricardo Ferretti (Tigres) is making a first change, with Raymundo Fulgencio replacing the possibly injured Javier Aquino.
In the minute 35, Queretaro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Tigres have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Carlos Salcedo of Tigres smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
In the minute 38, Tigres to take a throw-in in Queretaro territory.
Tigres push forward at Estadio Universitario (UANL) and Jesus Duenas gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Queretaro defence.
Tigres's Andre Pierre Gignac breaks free at Estadio Universitario (UANL). But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 40, It's a goal kick for the away team in Nuevo Leon.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a Queretaro throw-in in Tigres's half.
Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
In the minute 44, Tigres have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Tigres's Guido Pizarro gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Nuevo Leon.
Tigres have a goal kick.
In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the away team in Nuevo Leon.
Nicolas Lopez is on a sub for Hugo Ayala for Tigres.
Can Tigres capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Queretaro's half?
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Tigres.
Luis Rodriguez is on target to give Tigres a 1-0 advantage.
That's a fine assist from Rafael Carioca.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Queretaro in the half of Tigres.
Queretaro drives forward and Angel Sepulveda gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
In the minute 56, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a throw-in for Tigres, close to Queretaro's area.
Queretaro's Daniel Cervantes is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Queretaro.
In the minute 58, Tigres pushes forward through Andre Pierre Gignac, whose finish on goal is saved.
Tigres have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
In the minute 61, Tigres's Nicolas Lopez misses with an attempt on goal.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Queretaro a goal kick.
Queretaro's Alfonso Luna gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Universitario (UANL). But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 64, Tigres are pushing forward but Andre Pierre Gignac's finish is wide of the goal.
Queretaro have a goal kick.
Free kick Queretaro.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Queretaro.
Great finish from Nicolas Lopez to give Tigres a 2-0 lead.
Great play from Leonardo Fernandez to set up the goal.
In the minute 67, Erik Vera is booked for the away team.
Free kick for Tigres in the half of Queretaro.
Throw-in for Queretaro in the half of Tigres.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Tigres close to the penalty box.
The home team have replaced Rafael Carioca with Diego Reyes. This is the third substitution made today by Ricardo Ferretti.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 72, Alex Diego is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Universitario (UANL) with Julio Nava replacing Erik Vera.
Kevin Escamilla is replacing Angel Sepulveda for the away team.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Queretaro.
In the minute 76, Queretaro drive forward but Julio Nava is judged offside.
Luis Rodriguez for Tigres is whistled offside.
Ball safe as Tigres is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 80, In Nuevo Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Leonardo Fernandez for Tigres gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 81, It's a goal kick for the away team in Nuevo Leon.
Jordan Sierra is replacing Julian Quinones for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
It's now 3-0 in Nuevo Leon as Nicolas Lopez scores for Tigres.
Raymundo Fulgencio instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 85, Luis Rodriguez (Tigres) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Tigres.
In Nuevo Leon Tigres attack through Andre Pierre Gignac. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for Tigres at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Alex Diego (Queretaro) is making a third substitution, with Juan Pablo Meza replacing Alfonso Luna.
The away team replace Daniel Cervantes with Omar Arellano.
Throw-in for Tigres in their own half.
Throw-in Queretaro.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio Universitario (UANL).
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Queretaro a goal kick.
Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tigres's half?
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
That's full-time at Estadio Universitario (UANL). The final score is 3-0.
